channel.title: Comments on: About
channel.description: A Year Off With Our Kids

item.title: By: Elyse Fredin
item.dc:creator: Elyse Fredin
item.description:
You guys are so inspiring. So happy to see you having such a blast. We have realized over the past years too that material things are just things. It is not what life is about. Time with people we love is priceless. So glad you could have this time with your kiddos.
With Love Elyse
item.content:encoded:
You guys are so inspiring. So happy to see you having such a blast. We have realized over the past years too that material things are just things. It is not what life is about. Time with people we love is priceless. So glad you could have this time with your kiddos.

With Love
Elyse

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Chad Curtis

item.description: just Read some of the posts as I had no idea what Travis had been up to in a few years. What a year you will have

item.title: By: Lorna Cunneen
item.dc:creator: Lorna Cunneen
item.description: Wow, how awesome is this, I am so jealous! I hope you have a fabulous year with your family, amazing experiences and wonderful memories ... enjoy xx
item.content:encoded:
Wow, how awesome is this, I am so jealous! I hope you have a fabulous year with your family, amazing experiences and wonderful memories … enjoy xx

item.title: By: Michele Bright
item.dc:creator: Michele Bright
item.description: WOW how amazing. Our children want nothing more than our 'time' - the most prescious gift we have to give them! Love every second xx
item.content:encoded:
WOW how amazing. Our children want nothing more than our ‘time’ – the most prescious gift we have to give them! Love every second xx

item.title: By: Prateek
item.dc:creator: Prateek
item.description: How awesome is that!!! Truly inspirational. I cant wait to hear more about your days - even though I know how I will feel when I read them :) - jealous, inspired, motivated, jealous, recharged, wishing you well....Way to go Opheims!!! More power to you.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Chris Daigneault
item.dc:creator: Chris Daigneault
item.description: Congrats! You two are living my dream. I wish nothing but the best for you. I would also like to add what a pleasure it was working with you. You will be missed.
item.content:encoded:
Congrats! You two are living my dream. I wish nothing but the best for you. I would also like to add what a pleasure it was working with you. You will be missed.

item.title: By: Sandra
item.dc:creator: Sandra
item.description: Go Opheim's! The Deerfield based "Zuerich Gang" is losing two prominent members - but be assured that I will follow the pink days adventure of the Opheim foursome ... And "yes" - I will be jealous when you hit the slopes of Breckenridge! Cudos making this decision and making unforgettable memories. If not now - when??!! Take care - Sandra (oh and holler if you need chocolate, cookies or gum supplies )
item.content:encoded:
Go Opheim’s! The Deerfield based “Zuerich Gang” is losing two prominent members – but be assured that I will follow the pink days adventure of the Opheim foursome … And “yes” – I will be jealous when you hit the slopes of Breckenridge! Cudos making this decision and making unforgettable memories. If not now – when??!! Take care – Sandra (oh and holler if you need chocolate, cookies or gum supplies ðŸ˜‰)

item.title: By: Eric Overbeek
item.dc:creator: Eric Overbeek
item.description: AMAZING....what a FABULOUS IDEA and you guys have all reasons to make this dream come true! Life is too short not to cherish those great moments together. Have a fantastic break and enjoy every second of it! Greets from Zurich
item.content:encoded:
AMAZING….what a FABULOUS IDEA and you guys have all reasons to make this dream come true! Life is too short not to cherish those great moments together. Have a fantastic break and enjoy every second of it! Greets from Zurich
